title: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE
text: geocodebr package enables one geocode Brazilian addresses using National Registry Addresses Statistical Purposes (english Cadastro Nacional de Endereços para Fins Estatísticos, CNEFE). CNEFE published Brazilian official statistics geography office, IBGE.

title: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE
text: package yet CRAN. can install development version :
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("ipeaGIT/geocodebr")

title: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE
text: Soon.

title: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE
text: geocodebr developed team Institute Applied Economic Research (Ipea), Brazil.

what: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
title: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
text: Downloads enriched version CNEFE (National Registry Addresses Statistical Purposes, portuguese) data set, purposefully built used package.

title: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
code: download_cnefe(state = "all", progress = TRUE, cache = TRUE)

title: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
text: state character vector. states whose CNEFE data downloaded. Either "" (default), case data states downloaded, vector states abbreviations (e.g. c("RJ", "DF") download data Rio de Janeiro Federal District). progress logical. Whether display download progress bar. Defaults TRUE. cache Logical. Whether function read data cached locally, much faster. Defaults TRUE. first time user runs function, censobr download file store locally file needs download . FALSE, function download data overwrite local file.

title: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
text: directory path data saved.

title: Download the CNEFE data set — download_cnefe
code: download_cnefe(state = "AC", progress = FALSE) #> [1] "/home/runner/.cache/R/geocodebr/data_release_v0.1.0/estado=AC/part-0.parquet"  download_cnefe(state = c("AC", "AL"), progress = FALSE) #> [1] "/home/runner/.cache/R/geocodebr/data_release_v0.1.0/estado=AC/part-0.parquet" #> [2] "/home/runner/.cache/R/geocodebr/data_release_v0.1.0/estado=AL/part-0.parquet"

what: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
title: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
text: Download microdata population records Brazil's census. Data collected sample component questionnaire.

title: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
code: geocode(   input_table,   logradouro = NULL,   numero = NULL,   complemento = NULL,   cep = NULL,   bairro = NULL,   municipio = NULL,   estado = NULL,   progress = TRUE,   output_simple = TRUE,   ncores = NULL,   cache = TRUE )

title: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
text: input_table data frame. logradouro string. numero string. complemento string. cep string. bairro string. municipio string. estado string. progress logical. Whether display download progress bar. Defaults TRUE. output_simple Logic. Defaults TRUE ncores Number cores used parallel execution. Defaults number available cores minus 1. cache Logical. Whether function read data cached locally, much faster. Defaults TRUE. first time user runs function, censobr download file store locally file needs download . FALSE, function download data overwrite local file.

title: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
text: arrow Dataset "data.frame" object.

title: Download microdata of population records from Brazil's census — geocode
code: # open input data data_path <- system.file("extdata/sample_1.csv", package = "geocodebr") input_df <- read.csv(data_path)  # df <- geocodebr::geocode( #   input_table = input_df, #   logradouro = "nm_logradouro", #   numero = "Numero", #   complemento = "Complemento", #   cep = "Cep", #   bairro = "Bairro", #   municipio = "nm_municipio", #   estado = "nm_uf" #   )

what: geocodebr: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE — geocodebr
title: geocodebr: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE — geocodebr
text: Geocode Brazilian addresses based modified version Cadastro Nacional de Endereços para Fins Estatísticos (CNEFE), published Brazil official statistics geography office IBGE https://www.ibge.gov.br/estatisticas/sociais/populacao/38734-cadastro-nacional-de-enderecos-para-fins-estatisticos.html.

title: geocodebr: Geocode Brazilian Addresses with CNEFE — geocodebr
text: Please check vignettes data documentation website.

what: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
title: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
text: Manage cached files geocodebr package

title: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
code: geocodebr_cache(list_files = TRUE, delete_file = NULL, silent = FALSE)

title: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
text: list_files Logical. Whether print message address geocodebr data sets cached locally. Defaults TRUE. delete_file String. file name (basename) geocodebr data set cached locally deleted. Defaults NULL, file deleted. delete_file = "", cached geocodebr files deleted. silent Logical. Defaults TRUE messages printed.

title: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
text: message indicating file exist /ones deleted local cache directory.

title: Manage cached files from the geocodebr package — geocodebr_cache
code: # list all files cached geocodebr_cache(list_files = TRUE) #> Files currently chached: #>  #> character(0)  # delete particular file geocodebr_cache(delete_file = '2010_deaths') #> The file '2010_deaths' is not cached. #> Files currently chached: #>  #> character(0)

what: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
title: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
text: Set custom directory caching files geocodebr package. users want set custom cache directory, function needs run new R session.

title: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
code: set_geocodebr_cache_dir(path = NULL)

title: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
text: path String. path existing directory. defaults path = NULL, use default directory

title: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
text: message indicating directory geocodebr files cached.

title: Set custom cache directory for geocodebr files — set_geocodebr_cache_dir
code: # Set custom cache directory tempd <- tempdir() set_geocodebr_cache_dir(path = tempd) #> geocodebr files will be cached at  /tmp/RtmpNZf004  # back to default path set_geocodebr_cache_dir(path = NULL) #> geocodebr files will be cached at  /home/runner/.cache/R/geocodebr/data_release_v0.0.1
